|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…

|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg

|vo_08_08_tx         = ベネットお兄ちゃんはいい人だよ！一緒に冒険に行くと、いつもお宝が手に入るんだ！…ベネットお兄ちゃんは何も手に入らないみたいだけどね、なんでだろう？

|vo_08_09_title      = ディオナについて…

|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diona.ogg

|vo_08_09_rm         = Diona-onee-chan wa ii hito da yo! "Jibun no chikara de Mondo no shuzougyou wo tsubusu" tte kangaekata wa omoshiroi yo ne, Kuree mo bakudan de tetsudau! {{lmdash}}Nn, "Mondo no shuzougyou" wa yoku wakaranai kedo ne, bakemono ka na?

|vo_08_09_actualtx   = [...]「モンドの酒造業」はよく分からないけどね、{{Highlight|マモノ}}かな？
|vo_08_09_actualrm   = [...] "Mondo no shuzougyou" wa yoku wakaranai kedo ne, {{Highlight|mamono}} ka na?
|vo_08_10_title      = アルベドについて…

|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = アルベドお兄ちゃんとクレーには秘密の約束があるの！工房の扉に「実験中」の札があるときは、またあとで来てって約束なの。アルベドお兄ちゃんが仕事じゃない時はいつも長いことクレーの相手をしてくれるから、クレーも我慢して待つんだ！
|vo_08_10_rm         = Arubedo-onii-chan to Kuree ni wa himitsu no yakusoku ga aru no! Koubou no tobira ni "jikken-chuu" no fuda ga aru toki wa, mata ato de kite tte yakusoku na no. Arubedo-onii-chan ga shigoto ja nai toki wa itsumo nagai koto Kuree no aite wo shite kureru kara, Kuree mo gaman shite matsu nda!
|vo_08_10_tl         = Big Brother Albedo and Klee made a secret promise! We promised that when there's a sign on the workshop door saying "Experiment in Progress," I'll come back later. Big Brother Albedo always keeps Klee company for a long time when he isn't working, so Klee will wait patiently for him too!
|vo_08_11_title      = モナについて…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Mona]]

|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mona.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = モナお姉ちゃんはいい人だよ！アルベドお兄ちゃんとクレーのところに遊びに来ると、いつもよく分からないけど面白い話を聞かせてくれるの！もっと遊びに来てほしいな！
|vo_08_11_rm         = Mona-onee-chan wa ii hito da yo! Arubedo-onii-chan to Kuree no tokoro ni asobi ni kuru to, itsumo yoku wakaranai kedo omoshiroi hanashi wo kikasete kureru no! Motto asobi ni kite hoshii na!
|vo_08_11_tl         = Big Sister Mona is a good person! Whenever she comes to play with Big Brother Albedo and Klee, she always says some really interesting stuff that I don't understand! I'd like her to come and play more often!
|vo_08_12_title      = スクロースについて…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = スクロースお姉ちゃんはいい人だよ！跳べて走れるボンボンほしい？って聞いてくれたの。えへへっ、もちろんほしいよ！何百個もほしい！モンドの街道、階段、広場がボンボンだらけになったらいいな！
|vo_08_12_rm         = Sukuroosu-onee-chan wa ii hito da yo! Tobete hashireru Bon-Bon hoshii? tte kiite kureta no. Ehehe', mochiron hoshii yo! Nanbyakko mo hoshii! Mondo no kaidou, kaidan, hiroba ga Bon-Bon darake ni nattara ii na!
|vo_08_12_tl         = Big Sister Sucrose is a good person! She asked me, "Do you want a Jumpy Dumpty that can run and jump?" Ehehe, of course I do! I want hundreds of them! It'd be so fun if Mondstadt's streets, staircases, and squares were all covered in Jumpy Dumpties!

|vo_09_01_title      = クレーを知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = こんにちは！クレーのとこに遊びに来たの？
|vo_09_01_rm         = Konnichiwa! Kuree no toko ni asobi ni kita no?
|vo_09_01_tl         = Hello! Are you here for playtime with Klee?
|vo_09_02_title      = クレーを知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = うん、この爆弾はクレーの最新作だよ！うまくできてるでしょ？…えっ&mdash;&mdash;火災現場で見つけたの？クレーじゃない、絶対違うよ。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Un, kono bakudan wa Kuree no saishinsaku da yo! Umaku dekiteru desho? ...E'{{lmdash}} Kasai genba de mitsuketa no? Kuree ja nai, zettai chigau yo.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Yeah, this bomb is Klee's newest creation! I did a good job, right? ...Huh&mdash; You found it at the scene of a fire? It wasn't Klee, it definitely wasn't.
|vo_09_03_title      = クレーを知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 爆弾のレシピの多くは反省室に閉じ込められている時に思いついたんだけど…閉じ込められることがなくなったらもっといいのに…
|vo_09_03_rm         = Bakudan no reshipi no ooku wa hanseishitsu ni tojikomerareteiru toki ni omoitsuita nda kedo... Tojikomerareru koto ga naku nattara motto ii no ni...
|vo_09_03_tl         = I come up with most of my recipes for bombs while locked in solitary confinement... But it'd still be better if I wasn't locked up...
|vo_09_03_actualtx   = 爆弾の{{Highlight|配合}}の多くは反省室に閉じ込められている時に思いついたんだけど… [...]
|vo_09_03_actualrm   = Bakudan no {{Highlight|haigou}} no ooku wa hanseishitsu ni tojikomerareteiru toki ni omoitsuita nda kedo... [...]
|vo_09_03_actualtl   = I come up with most of my {{Highlight|combinations}} for bombs while locked in solitary confinement... [...]
|vo_09_04_title      = クレーを知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = これはドドコだよ、クレーの昔からの友達なの。名前をちゃんと覚えてね、もう「バッグについてるぬいぐるみ」なんて呼ばないこと。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Kore wa Dodoko da yo, Kuree no mukashi kara no tomodachi na no. Namae wo chanto oboete ne, mou "baggu ni tsuiteru nuigurumi" nante yobanai koto.
|vo_09_04_tl         = This is Dodoco, Klee's longtime friend. Remember her name now, and don't call her "the stuffed animal hanging on your bag."
|vo_09_05_title      = クレーを知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = いつもクレーのためにトラブルを解決してくれてありがとう！お礼にこの「クレーの焼き魚」をあげるよ！&mdash;&mdash;実はこのお魚、まだ湖の中にいた時に爆弾で焼かれたものなんだけど、でもそんなのいつものことだから、気にしない気にしない。
|vo_09_05_rm         = Itsumo Kuree no tame ni toraburu wo kaiketsu shite kurete arigatou! O-rei ni kono "Kuree no Yakizakana" wo ageru yo! {{lmdash}}Jitsu wa kono o-sakana, mada mizuumi no naka ni ita toki ni bakudan de yakareta mono nan da kedo, de mo sonna no itsumo no koto da kara, ki ni shinai ki ni shinai.
|vo_09_05_tl         = Thank you for always getting Klee out of trouble! As thanks, let me give you this "Klee's Grilled Fish"! &mdash;Actually, this fish was grilled by the bomb while it was still in the lake, but that's what always happens, so don't worry, don't worry.

|vo_10_01_title      = クレーの趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = クレーはモフモフしたものが好き。ドドコとか、蒲公英とか、あとレザーの髪の毛とか。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Kuree wa mofumofu shita mono ga suki. Dodoko to ka, tanpopo to ka, ato Rezaa no kaminoke to ka.
|vo_10_01_tl         = Klee likes fluffy things. Like Dodoco, and dandelions, and Razor's hair.
|vo_10_02_title      = クレーの悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = はあ、いい人だね、悪い子のクレーとは真逆…今回の反省が終わったら、また遊びにつれてってね…
|vo_10_02_rm         = Haa, ii hito da ne, warui ko no Kuree to wa magyaku... Konkai no hansei ga owattara, mata asobi ni tsuretette ne...
|vo_10_02_tl         = *sigh* You're a good person, the opposite of Klee who's a bad child... When I'm done reflecting on my actions, please take me out to play again...
|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = モンドのスズキは美味しいよ、特にシードル湖のスズキはね！でたらめじゃないよ、これはママも認めてるからね。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Mondo no suzuki wa oishii yo, toku ni Shiidoru-ko no suzuki wa ne! Detarame ja nai yo, kore wa Mama mo mitometeru kara ne.
|vo_10_03_tl         = Mondstadt's basses are delicious, especially the ones in Cider Lake! I'm not making this up, Mom agrees with me too.
|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = モンドガニが嫌い&mdash;&mdash;カニはみんな嫌い&mdash;&mdash;クレーはお外で遊びたいの&mdash;&mdash;テーブルの前でゆっくり殻を剥くのはクレーには向いてないよ&mdash;&mdash;
|vo_10_04_rm         = Mondo-gani ga kirai{{lmdash}} Kani wa minna kirai{{lmdash}} Kuree wa o-soto de asobitai no{{lmdash}} Teeburu no mae de yukkuri kara wo muku no wa Kuree ni wa muitenai yo{{lmdash}}
|vo_10_04_tl         = I hate Mondstadt's crabs... I hate all crabs... Klee wants to go play outside... Sitting at the table and slowly peeling the shell off is not for Klee!

|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I

|vo_11_01_tx         = わぁ、いい匂い！でもクレー、お腹いっぱいでもう食べられない…
|vo_11_01_rm         = Waa, ii nioi! De mo Kuree, onaka ippai de mou taberarenai...

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 今日のごはんも美味しかった。クレー、とっても幸せだよ！ありがとう！
|vo_11_02_rm         = Kyou no gohan mo oishikatta. Kuree, tottemo shiawase da yo! Arigatou!
|vo_11_02_tl         = Today's meal was yummy. Klee's super happy! Thank you!

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = お、美味しそうだけど、食べるのがちょっと大変かも…えへへ、クレーを助けてくれる？
|vo_11_03_rm         = O, oishisou da kedo, taberu no ga chotto taihen ka mo... Ehehe, Kuree wo tasukete kureru?
|vo_11_03_tl         = It... It looks yummy, but it might be a little hard to eat... Hee-hee, can you please help Klee?

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = お誕生日おめでとう！誕生日は楽しいね。クレーより年上だから、誕生日を過ごした回数はクレーより多いよね？羨ましいなぁ！
|vo_12_01_rm         = O-tanjoubi omedetou! Tanjoubi wa tanoshii ne. Kuree yori toshiue da kara, tanjoubi wo sugoshita kaisuu wa Kuree yori ooi yo ne? Urayamashii naa!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday! Birthdays are fun. You're older than Klee, so you must have had more birthdays than Klee, right? I'm so jealous!

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = うん、新型爆弾の研究が終わった！ジン団長に気付かれる前に逃げよう！
|vo_13_01_rm         = Un, shingata bakudan no kenkyuu ga owatta! Jin-danchou ni kidzukareru mae ni nigeyou!
|vo_13_01_tl         = Mm, my new bomb research is complete! Let's run away before Master Jean notices!
|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = また成長した気がする！でもジン団長はいつも「成長は騎士として当然のことだ」って言うの。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Mata seichou shita ki ga suru! De mo Jin-danchou wa itsumo "Seichou wa kishi toshite touzen no koto da" tte iu no.
|vo_13_02_tl         = I feel like I improved again! But Master Jean always says "For a knight, improvement is a matter of course."
|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 研究用の材料をいつも一緒に集めてくれてありがとう！爆弾の作り方を知りたくなったら、クレーが教えてあげるよ。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Kenkyuu-you no zairyou wo itsumo issho ni atsumete kurete arigatou! Bakudan no tsukurikata wo shiritaku nattara, Kuree ga oshiete ageru yo.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Thank you for always gathering research materials for me! If you wanna know how to make a bomb, Klee can teach you.
|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 昔ね、初めて爆発の音を聞いた時、怖くなかったの…その後、みんなはそうじゃないって知ったんだ…でも、あなたもクレーの爆弾を怖がらないよね！へへっ、よかった、クレーはいいお友達を持てたね！
|vo_13_04_rm         = Mukashi ne, hajimete bakuhatsu no oto wo kiita toki, kowakunakatta no... Sono ato, minna wa sou ja nai tte shitta nda... De mo, anata mo Kuree no bakudan wo kowagaranai yo ne! Hehe', yokatta, Kuree wa ii o-tomodachi wo moteta ne!
|vo_13_04_tl         = Long ago, when I first heard an explosion, I wasn't scared... Later, I found out everyone else isn't like that... But you're not scared of Klee's bombs either! Hehe, that's good, Klee has made such a great friend!
}}
